thread.title: Wencor Group Announces Relocation Of Corporate Headquarters To Peachtree City, Georgia
thread.title_full: Wencor Group Announces Relocation Of Corporate Headquarters To Peachtree City, Georgia - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Wencor Group Announces Relocation Of Corporate Headquarters To Peachtree City, Georgia
text:
Wencor Group
PEACHTREE CITY, Ga. , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Wencor Group is pleased to announce the opening of its new global headquarters at 416 Dividend Drive in Peachtree City, Georgia . Corporate and North American warehouse operations will now be conducted from this new Atlanta metro location, while the Miami warehouse will continue to support the Latin American region. Wencor's PMA Engineering and Product Development resources will support customers from both the Peachtree City and Springville, Utah offices.
"By investing in a state-of-the-art facility, we are well positioned to expand our product and service capabilities, strengthening the Wencor Group brand as a worldwide leader of aftermarket solutions," said Rick Tonney , President of Wencor Distribution. Keith Coleman , President of Wencor PMA also commented, "Our new, 163,000 square foot facility and its close proximity to the world's busiest airport will enable us to serve our customers more efficiently. Furthermore, our new corporate location provides access to a significantly larger talent pool, enabling Wencor Group to recruit the very best talent within the aviation industry."
Wencor Group will be hosting an open house event for its customers, suppliers and community constituents Friday, October 30, 2015 at the new Peachtree City facility.
About Wencor Group
Wencor Group is a global aerospace industry leader that offers PMA design, CMM and DER repairs, and distribution solutions for airline operators, repair stations, manufacturers, and militaries around the world. Corporate affiliates include: Wencor, Aerospace Coatings International, Soundair Aviation Services, PHS/MWA Aviation Services, Flight Line Products, Xtra Aerospace, and Kitco Defense. Wencor Group is headquartered in the Atlanta metro area with locations in Utah , Miami , Washington , Alabama , Southern California , Amsterdam , Singapore , Beijing , Shanghai , and Istanbul . For more information, please visit www.wencorgroup.com .
